name: Dog Rescue: Draw Puzzle
description:
You draw a line with your finger to form a wall that protects the dog from the bees in the hive. During the bee attack, you need to draw to save the dog with the painted wall for 10 seconds, hold on and you will win the game. Use your brain to save the dog.
Not only can you save your dog, but you can also save other animals when changing multiple memes such as pandas, cats, frogs, etc... Share with your friends and save pets together!
